level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary repeal of section, see § 301(o) of the Fiscal Year 1996 Budget Support Emergency Act of 1996 (D.C. Act 11-264, April 26, 1996, 43 DCR 2412), and § 201(o) of the Fiscal Year 1996 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 1996 (D.C. Act 11-335, August 1, 1996, 43 DCR 4256).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-152
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-152, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 38-1201.03.
